price: ߌߘߙߌ߬ߛߊ߬ ߞߏߝߐ߫ ߟߍߙߊ ߞߣߐ߫، ߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ ߕߌ߯ ߣߌ߫ ߟߊ߬ߝߐ߬ߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِدۡرِيسَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi id'rīsa innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
